subject: Nascar Nextel Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon, who trails his Hendrick Motorsports teammate Jimmie Johnson by 30 points in the Nextel Cup standings, qualified third for tomorrow’s Nextel Cup race at Phoenix International Raceway in Arizona. Johnson will start sixth. The former Indianapolis 500 winners Sam Hornish Jr., Jacques Villeneuve and Juan Pablo Montoya also earned a spot in the field, the first time three former Indy champions will compete in a Nascar race.
